unnormalised: My grandmother, Lakshmi Amma, swore by Ayurvedic treatments. She always said during Onam, after too much delicious biryani, a gentle abhyanga massage with sesame oil at Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala was the only thing that helped her digestion. Even at 85, she would walk 2 km daily! It’s something I’m trying to incorporate into my own wellness routine now. Will let you know how it goes.
